articles.summary: The Palo Alto-based company BitGo submitted paperwork to the Securities and Exchange Commission on September 19, 2025, seeking to trade on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker 'BTGO'. BitGo manages $90.3 billion in digital assets for institutional clients as of June 30, 2025.

articles.title: The Best Crypto To Buy Right Now Is Remittix As XRP & Cardano Trail In ...
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Remittix raised over $26M and has a wallet in beta. Remittix is positioning itself as a real-world payments disruptor. XRP and ADA remain strong contenders for the best crypto to buy right now, but Remittx is ahead of them.
